import React from 'react' import '../Login/Login.css' import { useState } from 'react' import { func } from 'prop-types' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') async function submit(e) { e.preventDefault() let { data } = await axios.post('/login', { email, password }) console.log(data); if(!data.error){ alert(data.message) }else{ re } } return (

Login

Have an account?

setEmail(e.target.value)} className="form-control" placeholder="email" required />
setPassword(e.target.value)} type="password" className="form-control" placeholder="Password" required />

) } export default Login
